title: Why binary search will not work

content.question: Suppose that a list of numbers contains values [-4, -1, 1, 5, 2, 10, 10, 15, 30]. Which of the following best explains why a binary search should NOT be used to search for an item in this list?

choices.label: The list contains both positive and negative elements.
The elements of the list are not sorted.
The list contains an odd number of elements.

content.answer: The elements of the list are not sorted.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Investigate the situation, context, or task.
